dc:title:
From Union Square to Rome,
Chapter 10 - Peace
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A vivid description of the bucolic life in the beach house on Staten Island. Elaborates on her growing faith and life of prayer, spurred on by the beauty, stillness, and knowledge she is pregnant.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 210 1938-01-12 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
